'''Kindlejoy''', previously known as '''Pyro-1''', is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] that appeared in [[Fabulous Fungus Frenzy]].

===Appearance===
Kindlejoy takes on the appearance of a [[Whirling Pyro Fungus]]. During combat in the event Fabulous Fungus Frenzy, like all Whirling Pyro Fungi, Kindlejoy appeared in its Scorched state.
